div.p: Prokofiev Catalogue and Digital Archive is the first authoritative catalogue of works by Prokofiev, one of the twentieth century's greatest composers.

A relational database and digital archive, PCDA links Prokofiev Archive holdings, catalogue information and digitized sources to an authority title list . While digitally preserving Prokofiev's output, PCDA allows users to find Prokofiev's works, locate their primary sources, view manuscripts and build up a context for compositions. Thematic entries allow users to identify works and recognize musical relations.
